doc.previous: In 2011, the Air Force disallowed the wear of so-called "Friday Name Tags" [clarification needed] by aircrew personnel on flight suits and flight jackets per the new dress and appearance standards.[31] This has been a tradition regarding call signs that dated to World War I.[32]
after: The United States has been involved in many wars, conflicts and operations using military air operations. Air combat operations before, and since the official conception of the USAF include:

In addition since the USAF dwarfs all allied air forces, it often provides support for allied forces in conflicts to which the United States is otherwise not involved, for example the 2013 French campaign in Mali.[34]
